forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 16C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 61F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High 17C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 64F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 65F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 16C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 62F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 47F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 12C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 13C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 57F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low near 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady light rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain transitioning to a few showers in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 14C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 59F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
